name: Nexus
longDesc: You enter a large, domed room that clearly had some ceremonial purpose.  In the center seems to be some sort of altar, and above it, at the top of the dome, you notice a collapsed chimney that lets in natural light. There are doors leading away from here in many directions- clearly this was once some sort of hub.
shortDesc: You step back into the large, domed room with many doors leading away.

shelves.name: Altar
shelves.desc: You walk up to the stone altar in the center of the room and notice an old, cooper box lays open atop it.

shelves.name: Suit of Armor
shelves.desc: Standing guard at the entrance to this room is a tall suit of armor made from silver that glistens in the light.

doors.name: Stone Archway
doors.desc: You look back at the large stone archway you remember passing through when you first entered the castle.  Maybe the enscribing was meant to be a warning?  Maybe you should have listened....

doors.name: Double Doors
doors.desc: A once beautiful pair of stained-glass doors framed in dark cherry wood stand to the southeast.  Some of the glass that has broken remains on the floor in front of them and through the missing pieces, you can see what appears to be hundreds of dusty books.
doors.unlock_desc: The double doors sway gently from the breeze that finds its way down the remains of the chimney.  The smell of old books fils the room.

doors.name: Copper Door
doors.desc: A large, copper door with iron details stands before you.  Smoke bellows out from the edges as it tries to escape from whatever is hidden inside.  You can feel heat radiating from the door as you ask yourself: 'Do I even dare try to enter it?'
doors.unlock_desc: I guess you dared because you inserted the copper key and unlocked the door.  You push open the heavy door, almost burning your hands as you do, and step inside.

doors.name: Ivy and Vines
doors.desc: What appeared to be a door from a distance turned out to actually be overgrown vines and ivy.  You try to get through them, but they have grown to be too tightly intertwined.
doors.unlock_desc: You cut through the ivy and vines that blocked your way into this room.  It is now easy to get in and out of.

doors.name: Winding Stairs
doors.desc: Hiding in the corner is a set of well-worn, dusty stairs that wind away to the northwest.

doors.name: Jade Archway
doors.desc: You flinch as you admire the archway that is constructed from dark jade and carved into the likeness of twisting serpents menacingly shimmering in the light.
